author: Pain-free Peter
message: I used to suffer from severe back pain for 2 years, but after visiting Chiropractic Foundations, I am now pain-free and able to live my life to the fullest.
problem: Suffered severe back pain for 2 years

author: Handicapped Harry
message: I was unable to walk properly for 3 months after a car accident. I met Eugene and he helped me get back on my feet in no time.

author: Crackling Carl
message: Few cracks and pops and I was back to normal.
problem: Neck pain from sitting too long

author: Boulder for a shoulder
message: Having trouble lifting my arms for 3 years, but after a few sessions, I am now able to lift my arms and my spirits. Thank you, Chiropractic Foundations.
